DOC.brief_summary: To determine patient unreactive lens care solution / Biofinity combination .
DOC.brief_title: BIOCLEAN FIRST CARE EX Combination With Biofinity Lens
DOC.criteria: Is 18 year age ( inclusive ) Has selfreported visual exam last two year Is currently adapt spherical soft CL wearer Has CL spherical prescription 0.25 12.00 ( inclusive ) Has less 1.00D spectacle cylinder eye . Is correctable visual acuity 20/20 good eye Has clear cornea active ocular disease Has read , understood sign information consent letter . Is willing comply wear schedule ( least 40 hr per week ) Is willing comply visit schedule Has never wear contact lens . Currently wear rigid gas permeable contact lens . Has history achieve comfortable CL wear ( 5 day per week ; > 8 hours/day ) Has CL prescription outside range 0.25 12.00D Has spectacle cylinder great 0.75D cylinder either eye . Has best correct spectacle distance vision worse 20/20 either eye . Has systemic disease affect ocular health . Is use systemic topical medication affect ocular health . Has ocular pathology severe insufficiency lacrimal secretion Has persistent , clinically significant corneal conjunctival staining Has active neovascularization central corneal scar . Is aphakic . Is pregnant lactating . Has undergone corneal refractive surgery . Is participate type eye related clinical research study .
